citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Toltrazuril which has been used for the puppy de-worming schedule was expired (5/2024). The use of expired
medications might not be effective and sometimes could make animals sick. Ensure that expired medications are not
used.
***Correct from 7/8/2024 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Toltrazuril which has been used for the puppy de-worming schedule was expired (5/2024). The use of expired 
medications might not be effective and sometimes could make animals sick. Ensure that expired medications are not 
used.  
***Correct from 7/8/2024 forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
